triples.name: Adaptive control
triples.relevance: Core method: paper proposes adaptive fixed-time control for nonlinear multi-agent systems

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: Application domain: the control method is designed for multi-agent systems with multiple interacting agents

triples.name: Radial basis function network
triples.relevance: Used to approximate unknown nonlinear functions in the control system

triples.name: Sliding mode control
triples.relevance: First order sliding mode differentiator is utilized to solve complexity issues

triples.name: Consensus dynamics
triples.relevance: Core problem: achieving consensus among follower agents relative to a leader

triples.name: Nonlinear control
triples.relevance: Main application area: controlling nonlinear multi-agent systems with actuator faults

triples.name: Neural network (machine learning)
triples.relevance: Radial basis function neural networks are employed for function approximation in the controller
